Module dbarsukova
Package dbarsukova

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbarsukova.View
  • public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    View class handles visual representation of Snake game. it provides methods for drawing various game elements such as the snake, food and game overlays.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      View​(int width, int height, int blockSize)
      constructs new View object with specified width, height and block size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      draws rectangular block element at specified position with given color.
      javafx.scene.Node drawBody​(int x, int y, int rotate)
      draws segment of snake's body at specified position with given rotation angle.

      • View

        public View​(int width,
            int height,
            int blockSize)
        constructs new View object with specified width, height and block size.
        Parameters:
        width - width of game area in blocks.
        height - height of game area in blocks.
        blockSize - size of each block in pixels.
